com.bluegosling.concurrent

Class InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluegosling.concurrent.InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator.Builder
  • Enclosing interface:
    InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator

    public static class InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator.Builder
extends Object
    Builds a decorator, composing up to three functional interfaces. This is useful since InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator itself is not a function interface and thus cannot be provided directly by lambda expressions.

    • Method Summary

      • after

        public InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator.Builder after(BiConsumer<? super ExecutorService,? super Callable<?>> action)
        Defines the action performed after each task is run. This action will be run after both successful and failed tasks. The action does not take the cause of failure (when invoked after failed tasks).
        Parameters:
        action - the action
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining

      • after

        public InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator.Builder after(Consumer<? super Callable<?>> action)
        Defines the action performed after each task is run. This action will be run after both successful and failed tasks. The action takes only the task.
        Parameters:
        action - the action
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining

      • after

        Returns:
